arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Barcelona XIs: Predicted lineups, confirmed team news and injuries for Spanish Super Cup final
arts.sum: Clasico rivals meet in Jeddah in pursuit of domestic silverware

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Real Madrid 3 - 0 Real Mallorca; 2025 Spanish Super Cup
arts.sum: Finished the game with 4 key passes, a well-taken goal to open the scoring, and countless sprints off the ball to hound the opposition. Eventually got his own goal in the final minute of the match with a one-touch finish off a Lucas cross.

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham emulates David Beckham feat in Real Madrid's Spanish Super Cup win over Mallorca
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham joins David Beckham in an exclusive club with his goal in Thursday's 3-0 win over Mallorca in the Spanish Super Cup semi-final.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid star told to “learn how to win” after Spanish Super Cup controversy
arts.sum: Real Madrid and Barcelona will meet in El Clásico in the final of the 2025 Spanish Super Cup after Carlo Ancelotti’s team defeated Mallorca 3-0 in Thursday’s semifinal, which ended in controversy with a number of players on either side getting involved in a heated altercation immediately after Los Blancos’ third goal in injury time. And it was Asencio who was singled out for criticism by Mallorca captain Dani Rodríguez after the game.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Real Madrid 3 - 0 Mallorca, Post-game, Spanish Super Cup Semi-finals, 2025
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani and Siddharth Ramsundar discuss: Join our El Clasico Post-game show (MEMBERS-ONLY): Patreon.com/ManagingMadrid

arts.ttl: ‘Every game’ – Real Madrid star takes aim at Mallorca’s Pablo Maffeo after Super Cup clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Aurélien Tchouaméni has this evening moved to reveal his frustration with Mallorca defender Pablo Maffeo. This comes after the latter was at the heart of another heated…

arts.ttl: Bellingham and Rodrygo sink Mallorca as Real Madrid reach Super Cup final
arts.sum: Real Madrid 3-0 Mallorca Spanish champions set to face rivals Barcelona in Jeddah Second-half goals from Jude Bellingham and Rodrygo helped Real Madrid to a 3-0 win over Mallorca in the Spanish Super Cup semi-finals and set up a showdown with Barcelona in Jeddah. Bellingham broke the deadlock after the hour mark with a low drive following an excellent team move. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Three questions and three answers from Real Madrid 3-0 Mallorca
arts.sum: Four times out of five that Real Madrid have taken part in the Spanish Super Cup since the semi-final and final four format were introduced in 2020, they have qualified for the final. The final of the Spanish Super Cup will take place with a Clásico as Real Madrid take on FC Barcelona, again at the King Abdullah Sports City Stadium in Jeddah, for the 42nd title in the competition’s history.

arts.ttl: Tensions mount as Mallorca’s Dani Rodríguez sends message to Real Madrid star after Super Cup clash
arts.sum: RCD Mallorca star Dani Rodríguez has this evening sent a message of advice the way of Real Madrid youngster Raúl Asencio. This comes in response to the defender’s behaviour late…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid transfer target opens contract talks with Sevilla
arts.sum: Real Madrid will look to address the right-back position in the next couple of years, and one player that they’ve been linked with is Juanlu Sanchez. The 21-year-old has been on the club’s radar for some time now, and although he is only considered to be backup target compared to Trent Alexander-Arnold, he is very […] The post Real Madrid transfer target opens contract talks with Sevilla appeared first on Football España.
